Header: Illegal sand miners assault a wildlife officer
Content: A group of illegal sand miners have attacked a wildlife officer in Polonnaruwa. The Assistant Wildlife Conservator of Polonnaruwa P. M. B. Wijekoon was admitted to Polonnaruwa General Hospital last night. A group of Wildlife Conservation officers last night carried out a raid following a tip-off on a sand mining racket. Assistant Forest Conservator P. M. B. Weejekoon said that two unidentified persons arrived at the spot and attacked them. Polonnaruwa Police are conducting investigations.
